item.title: HollowMan Redux: Google Presents Gmail Users the Invisibility Cloak
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: Google gave us a nice little present today. The power to be all-seeing but yet still remaining unseen. Yes, now you can be “invisible” in your gmail chat session. But beware, don’t fire up your gtalk, or you will again be as visible as a 100 watt bulb in a 4x4 room at night.
